Analyte(s): Carbapenemase enzymes (KPC, NDM, OXA-48, VIM, IMP)
Specimen Container(s): Non-selective sheep blood agar culture media
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for RAPIDEC CARBA NP colorimetric kit for qualitative detection of carbapenemase enzymes in Enterobacteriaceae and Pseudomonas aeruginosa colonies
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative detection of carbapenemase enzymes in Enterobacteriaceae and Pseudomonas aeruginosa colonies with elevated MICs to carbapenems, as an aid in prevention and control of infection, not intended to guide or monitor treatment
